scenario_text.value: Oh, here you are, Renamon.
Yes, hello, Takuma.

I thought if there was anywhere in this place
that felt like it was mine, this was it.

You know, I never thought we’d all come back
here again.
So, this place means something to you?

You could say that. Whatever else is true,
this is where I have the strongest memories.

It’s the one place that brought Miyuki joy,
back when she wouldn’t respond to anything.

She would sing, and I would play along. She’d
even play piano a little, if badly.

Her expression stayed as blank as ever, but
it was the closest she came to being herself.

(Those must have been good times for Renamon
too.)

(It would’ve been nice to see Miyuki enjoying
herself. I wish they’d let us play too.)
(What should I say?)
You should’ve told us.
Wish I’d seen that.
You liked it too, huh?
You should’ve told us.

You know, you should’ve told us so we could
join you instead of playing by yourselves.

Hmph. Don’t be ridiculous. I wanted to be
alone with Miyuki anyway.
Besides, back then, I still didn’t trust you.
So...does that mean you trust us now?
What?! I...I misspoke. Forget I said that.
(I think he’s embarrassed... That’s a first.)
Wish I’d seen that.

You know, it would’ve been nice to see Miyuki
enjoying herself. I wish I’d seen that.

Does that make you jealous? That I got to see
a side of Miyuki no one else did?

Yeah, it makes me really jealous. I bet she
looked super cute.

Of course she did. This is Miyuki we’re
talking about.
Haha, you don’t mince words, do you?

(Reminds me of Kaito when he talks about Miu.
The two of them really are a lot alike.)
You liked it too, huh?
You liked it too, huh?
What makes you say that?

Didn’t you know? This whole time you’ve had
the nicest smile on your face.
Oh... I have, huh?

Well, it was nice. Those are some of my
fondest memories, that I hope I never forget.

(There’s that smile again. Miyuki really does
mean a lot to him, doesn’t she?)

Back when I first met Miyuki, she was a lot
more expressive than she was here.

If we defeat the Master, I wonder if she’ll
go back to being like that...
*sigh*

What do you think, Takuma? Will I ever hear
my “sister” sing again?

Don’t worry, “Haru.” We’re all doing
everything we can to make that happen.
Thank you, Takuma.

I too will do everything in my power to save
Miyuki.

Now, give me some time. I want to be alone
with my memories of her.
